title.rendered: Why You Need to Use Reddit in Your Digital Marketing Strategy

content.rendered:
Are you looking for a new channel for digital marketing? If you are, then you might want to consider adding Reddit to your digital marketing strategy. This platform hosts some of the hottest content that is published through a large network of contributors and users. When added up it attracts nearly 164 million individual and unique viewers and users every single month. This is why this is one of the best platforms that you need to be on, but you also need to know how to use it wisely before you start posting on it.

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • How the Site Works
  • Tips for Popular Posts
  • The Viewers
  • Event Reminders
  • Great Customer Service
  • Watch for Posts About Your Product
  • Wide Variety of Tools

How the Site Works

The first thing that you need to know about why you should be using this is that the site works. However, you might want to know just how it works and all of the content that is posted is either downvoted or upvoted by the various users. The Hot page is where the submissions that have the most upvotes are seen, which is one of the main pages that people view. Ensure that you are making sure that you post relevant information that will draw viewers to your post and that will help them to upvote it.

Tips for Popular Posts

There are a few tips that you would need to follow that would allow you and your post to get seen. There are a few steps that you would need to follow, including:

  • Researching The Appropriate Subreddit –

You want to ensure that you are picking the right subreddit for your post. If you don’t post in the right area, then you aren’t going to get the views that you want.

  • Post the link between 1 am to 7 am –

The posts that are put up during this time are the ones that do better than those posted throughout the day. This is because this is the ideal time because people can see the posts before they fall asleep or when they wake up. Also, there aren’t as many posts during this time, which means you have a  higher change of reaching the top.

  • Post high-quality content –

It is very important that all of the content that is posted is high quality. There are going to be numerous posts that might cover the same content, so if you have inferior content you aren’t going to get as many views as others would.

  • Share the post with friends –

You should also make sure that you are sharing the posts with your friends, so don’t be afraid to do that. This would make sure that they can share it with others and you would get a higher number of views.

There are plenty of tips that you can follow that would help you to achieve the goal of reaching the top of the posts. If you follow these, then you might just get where you want to be and this is the goal of your digital marketing strategy.

The Viewers

Another thing that you need to think about when you are considering why to use this site for your digital marketing needs in 2019 is because of the viewers. You should make sure that you know the percentages and make-up of the people who are coming to the site. What you should know about the users includes:

  • 71% of the new users to the site are male
  • 59% of the new users are between the ages of 18 and 29
  • 47% say they are liberal, 13% say they are conservative, and 39% claim to be moderate
  • 47% of the users of Reddit are always online and only 21% of all adults in the US are online all of the time

If these are the groups that you are attempting to target, then this is the perfect place for your marketing techniques.

Event Reminders

Another thing that you can use when it comes to this site is the Redditads, which are simply reminders of any upcoming events, including the date and time. They also have a feature that links them to the official page for the event. You can use this feature to keep all of the readers informed about any upcoming events that are relevant to your company and brand. This is the best way to get people to see the event and click on your website without having to push them.

Great Customer Service

Another thing that you might not think about when it comes to why you should use Reddit in your strategy next year is that you can give great customer service. You can answer various technical questions that are posted, which would help you to bring in more loyal customers. You can also reply to any posts that are directly related to your business, which means that you can also help to solve problems if any arise.

Watch for Posts About Your Product

When it comes to digital marketing another thing that you can and should be doing, is checking out for posts regarding your product. If there are any, then you should chime in with some feedback, especially if they are talking about what they liked. If they are talking about what they would like to see, then ensure that you let them know that you have heard that and would consider that when you make an upgrade.

Wide Variety of Tools

Also, when it comes to implementing the use of Reddit in your digital marketing strategy, you can enjoy the wide variety of tools. These tools can help you to see what is going on and you need to know what they are, including:

  • Reddit Insight –

This tool is amazing and it can help you to measure the performance of your post. You can figure out what type of content is going to work the best and what isn’t going to work. This also allows you to track the data analytics for all of your Reddit posts and accounts so that you can see what is going on and what posts have the most views and much more.

  • Reddit Enhancement Suite –

This is also called RES and it is very useful. It can make the browsing very smooth and it will let you tag other users. Not only that, but it allows you to see who is positively reacting to what you are posting, including in the past.

These are only a few of the main tools that you can enjoy when you are using the site, which can make the entire thing easier. If you are looking for a way to see what is happening with your posts and what will work and won’t you should avoid, then these are what you need to make it happen.

There are many reasons that Reddit is going to be one of the main tools and integral part of your digital marketing strategy for 2019. Not only is this the best way to hit your target audience, but because of the various subreddits you can post anything that people will want to see. This is a popular site, which is why everyone is always checking it and reading what is going on, so why not use it for your digital marketing services needs.
